description: Emmy nominations are out and some of the biggest nods are going to Netflix.
title: Emmys go digital: Netflix 'House of Cards' nominated
contentencoded:
Emmy nominations are out and some of the biggest nods are going to Netflix. The video streaming company's original drama "House of Cards" snagged a nomination for Best Drama. And there was recognition for the company's other programming, such as "Arrested Development" and "Hemlock Grove."

Samantha Murphy, tech reporter for the website Mashable, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, July 18, 2013
teaser: Emmy nominations are out and some of the biggest nods are going to Netflix.
